page.title: 06LEGENDS.
page.content: We wondered how Bold in Widnes got its name so we decided to find out. It seems that many years ago a village was troubled by a mythical creature called the griffin.Eventually the villagers decided to offer a reward to anybody who could capture and kill the griffin.Quite soon a young blacksmith offered to try and kill the griffin. He built a strong cage and got in well armed. After a while the griffin came and attacked the cage, after a long struggle the griffin was injured and killed.The villagers were pleased and offered him some land as a reward. They tried to think of a name for this land, so because the blacksmith was known to be bold, they named the land BOLD.
